ChemDraw the leading solution for chemical structure drawing and chemistry communication

Signals Notebook a cloud native SaaS electronic lab notebook used by the largest customer base compared to our competition and

Signals Research Suite a  complete unified SaaS software for scientific research designed for researchers to collaborate from early research through early development, supporting the entire Make-Test-Decide innovation cycle

  • Program Evaluation: Continuously assess the effectiveness of marketing programs supporting your solutions and report back to the business on necessary adjustments

  • Sales Support: Support our sales channels by training them on the problems we solve for buyers and users, developing internal tools and external collateral, and guiding their use
  • Market Awareness: Act as the "eyes and ears" of your market for product management.
